item.title: Lit Ctf 2022 Pwn Writeup - Part 2: Regex
item.description:
A challenge with a new heap exploitation technique: House of Muney. In this challenge, all we need is: a leak, an arbitrary free, and only one malloc (with input) to control RIP.
And only applicable to binary without FULL RELRO protection.

item.title: Lit Ctf 2022 Pwn Writeup - Part 1: House of Cockarocha
item.description:
Surprisingly a ctf contest for highschoolers actually has a lot of difficult pwn challenges.
These challenges have a lot of creative exploiting techniques: House of Husk, House of Muney.
Therefore, I wanted to make a detailed writeup, starting with the first challenge: House of Cockarocha

item.title: Imaginary Ctf 2022 Pwn Writeup
item.description: My team purf3ct cleared the pwn section of this ctf, so for the first time, I feel qualifed enough to make a writeup about 2 heap challenges, which introduce some nice heap exploitation techniques

item.title: $ whoami
item.description: Computer Science undergrad student at University of Engineeering and Technology I have been learning about Binary Exploitation since the beginning of this year, hopefully will get better soon Interested in technology in general You can randomly find me in SEA Valorant, at the bottom rank of course About this blog, currently it consists of writups (and my failure)
